00027     def testMetricsMinMaxF(self):
00028         # Pedigree from van Noordwijck and Scharloo (1981) as presented
00029         # in Hartl and Clark (1989), p. 242.
00030         options = {}
00031         options['renumber'] = 0
00032         options['messages'] = 'quiet'
00033         options['pedfile'] = 'tests/hartlandclark.ped'
00034         options['pedformat'] = 'asd'
00035         options['sepchar'] = ' '
00036         options['pedigree_is_renumbered'] = '1'
00037         options['form_nrm'] = '1'
00038         example = pyp_newclasses.NewPedigree(options)
00039         example.load()
00040         #example.nrm.info()
00041 
00042         high_coi, low_coi = pyp_metrics.min_max_f(example,n=5)
00043         print high_coi
00044         print low_coi
00045         #self.assertEqual(2.91, round(fe,2))
00046 
00047     def testMetricsEffectiveFoundersLacy(self):
00048         # Example taken from Lacy (1989), Appendix A.
00049         # Used to test calculation of effective population size.
00050         options = {}
00051         options['renumber'] = 0
00052         options['messages'] = 'quiet'
00053         options['pedfile'] = 'tests/lacy/lacy.ped'
00054         options['pedformat'] = 'asd'
00055         options['sepchar'] = ' '
00056         options['pedigree_is_renumbered'] = '1'
00057         example = pyp_newclasses.NewPedigree(options)
00058         example.load()
00059         fe = pyp_metrics.effective_founders_lacy(example)
00060         self.assertEqual(2.91, round(fe,2))
00061

00078     def testMetricsEffectiveFoundersBoichardA(self):
00079         # Example taken from Boichard et al. (1997), Figure 2.
00080         # Used to test calculation of effective founder number.
00081         options = {}
00082         options['messages'] = 'quiet'
00083         options['pedfile'] = 'tests/boichard/boichard2a.ped'
00084         options['pedname'] = 'Boichard Pedigree (Family 1 only)'
00085         options['pedformat'] = 'asdg'
00086         options['pedigree_is_renumbered'] = '1'
00087         options['filetag'] = 'example2a'
00088         example2a = pyp_newclasses.NewPedigree(options)
00089         example2a.load()
00090         fe = pyp_metrics.a_effective_founders_boichard(example2a)
00091         self.assertEqual(round(4.0,1), round(fe,1))
00092 
00093     def testMetricsEffectiveFoundersBoichardB(self):
00094         # Example taken from Boichard et al. (1997), Figure 2.
00095         # Used to test calculation of effective founder number.
00096         options = {}
00097         options['messages'] = 'quiet'
00098         options['pedfile'] = 'tests/boichard/boichard2b.ped'
00099         options['pedname'] = 'Boichard Pedigree (Family 2 only)'
00100         options['pedformat'] = 'asdg'
00101         options['pedigree_is_renumbered'] = '1'
00102         options['filetag'] = 'example2b'
00103         example2b = pyp_newclasses.NewPedigree(options)
00104         example2b.load()
00105         fe = pyp_metrics.a_effective_founders_boichard(example2b)
00106         self.assertEqual(round(2.0,1), round(fe,1))
00107 
00108     def testMetricsEffectiveFoundersBoichardC(self):
00109         # Example taken from Boichard et al. (1997), Figure 2.
00110         # Used to test calculation of effective founder number.
00111         options = {}
00112         options['messages'] = 'quiet'
00113         options['pedfile'] = 'tests/boichard/boichard2.ped'
00114         options['pedname'] = 'Boichard Pedigree (Family 1 and 2)'
00115         options['pedformat'] = 'asdg'
00116         options['pedigree_is_renumbered'] = '1'
00117         options['filetag'] = 'example2'
00118         example2 = pyp_newclasses.NewPedigree(options)
00119         example2.load()
00120         fe = pyp_metrics.a_effective_founders_boichard(example2)
00121         self.assertEqual(round(5.6,1), round(fe,1))

00123     def testMetricsEffectiveAncestorsDefiniteBoichardA(self):
00124         # Example taken from Boichard et al. (1997), Figure 2.
00125         # Used to test calculation of effective ancestor number.
00126         options = {}
00127         options['messages'] = 'quiet'
00128         options['pedfile'] = 'tests/boichard/boichard2a.ped'
00129         options['pedname'] = 'Boichard Pedigree (Family 1 only)'
00130         options['pedformat'] = 'asdg'
00131         options['pedigree_is_renumbered'] = '1'
00132         options['filetag'] = 'example2a'
00133         example2a = pyp_newclasses.NewPedigree(options)
00134         example2a.load()
00135         fa = pyp_metrics.a_effective_ancestors_definite(example2a)
00136         self.assertEqual(round(2.0,2), round(fa,2))
00137
